metadata.title: AliCloud Compliance Rules - Enhanced with Original Functions
metadata.description: Enterprise-grade normalized rule IDs with original function names preserved for complete traceability
metadata.assertion_standard: Enterprise-Grade CSPM (AWS Security Hub, Google SCC, Prisma Cloud aligned)
metadata.schema_description: Each rule contains: rule_id (normalized), original_function (from CSV), service info, and composite details
